title: [Large-scale] Inquiry-Based Science Education Program for Low-Achieving Elementary Students

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and experience with simple laboratory equipment
context.additional_context: Experimental kits are pre-delivered, with real-time interactive classes conducted using personal devices

learning_goals: Students can independently generate inquiry questions and solve them using scientific methods
Learners can systematically collect and analyze experimental data to explain the process of drawing conclusions
Learners can logically communicate their arguments with peers through scientific reasoning
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
